EmailTemplate.name: Independent's Guide.IG Lead Email 4
EmailTemplate.subject: New Guide from MBO Partners: Expand Your Business
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, To prepare you and your independent business for a productive 2013, MBO Partners brings our newest guide: Is It Time to Expand Your Solo Business? <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/grow/Expand-Business> This 7-page downloadable guide will provide strategies and techniques you can use to determine when and how to take your business to the next level.
This is another part of our fast-growing Independent's Guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide>, the online library of educational content for independent workers.
Please donâ€™t hesitate to contact MBO Partners if you have questions or suggestions for new content. ___________________________________ MBO Partners t: 703-793-6000 e: info@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
